function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Decreased emphasis on personal and environmental hygiene","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear instructions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of longitudinal view","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Liver transplant recipients with metabolic comorbidities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gnawing damage, spread of diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Safeguard equipment and aid communication","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Sterilization of equipment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential medium of transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased dbp, chemical costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Swabbing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hazardous tasks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Floor drain malfunction","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low capacity of countries at greatest risk to handle and minimize the risk of a pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Efficient replication in upper respiratory tract","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Less abrupt onset of symptoms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Predominantly exponential increase in transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete elimination of bias in the detection, collection, synthesis, and description of studies","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate surveillance techniques leading to uncontrolled disease proliferation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate bibliometric analysis leading to misinterpretation of publishing patterns and citation trends","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Cancellation of ad hoc events, travel restrictions, home quarantine, dissemination of fake news","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"60% reduction in transmission if not quarantined within 1 day from symptom onset, social distancing based on degree of pragmatism","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated walk-in clinics, inadequate training for medical workers, lack of specialized infrastructure, inadequate testing and surveillance, lack of case isolation, insufficient visitor controls, inadequate ppe exchange and disinfection","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate medical facilities, poor communication, lack of encrypted communication for top management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on prevention and security keywords in research studies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate bibliometric analysis of research keywords","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited research in critical areas related to disease control and outbreak management","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate knowledge and understanding of infection risk factors based on age, gender, and location of the population","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on drug efficacy, safety, and antibody response","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Large number of researchers in proximity increases the risk of contagious disease spread within the research community.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of cloud-based tracing and tracking framework may involve data privacy and security risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contingency approaches and protocols for pandemic management may lack effective implementation and adherence.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of loan waivers and liquidity programs for loan buyers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective outbreak role index ori measurement leading to inadequate support and flexibility in healthcare","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring and detection of contagious diseases due to lack of technology for remote continuous patient monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in mobilizing personal protective equipment at the time of crisis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protocols for identifying, transporting, and managing covid-19 positive cases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for pandemic outbreaks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring and surveillance of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on community-centered treatment","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of quantity in technological advancements for medical field during pandemic outbreaks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Challenges in tight isolation and containment of covid-19 patients","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for interdisciplinary collaboration in handling the crisis","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deficiency in pandemic spark assessment and prior containment strategies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Search databases may not cover all relevant articles related to contagious diseases like risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"The spread of covid-19 in cities and countries","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for recurring public-health emergencies in marginalization and disease outbreaks","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Response to contagious cities","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"}]}
